parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-0" /> <mxCell id="uumaDxv0ZFX6R_QqL9qd-5" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-3" target="uumaDxv0ZFX6R_QqL9qd-4"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-3" value="Запрашиваем пользовательский ввод слова" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=12;glass=0;strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="354" y="60" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uumaDxv0ZFX6R_QqL9qd-7" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="uumaDxv0ZFX6R_QqL9qd-4" target="uumaDxv0ZFX6R_QqL9qd-6"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uumaDxv0ZFX6R_QqL9qd-9" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="uumaDxv0ZFX6R_QqL9qd-4"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="675" y="330" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uumaDxv0ZFX6R_QqL9qd-4" value="Слово оканчивается на cs в нижнем регистре?" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;glass=0;strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="354" y="170" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uumaDxv0ZFX6R_QqL9qd-6" value="Возводим 2 в степень длины слова и печатаем на экране" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;glass=0;strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="110" y="330" width="170" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uumaDxv0ZFX6R_QqL9qd-10" value="Да" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="260" y="170" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uumaDxv0ZFX6R_QqL9qd-11" value="Нет" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="510" y="170" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uumaDxv0ZFX6R_QqL9qd-14" value="Разворачиваем слово и печатаем на экране" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;glass=0;strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="590" y="330" width="170" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
